FulfillmentOrderLineItem.name: FulfillmentOrderLineItem
FulfillmentOrderLineItem.description: Represents a product or delivery charge belonging to a FulfillmentOrder. Corresponds to an OrderItemSummary.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for orgs with the multicurrency feature enabled. ISO code for the currency of the FulfillmentOrder associated with the FulfillmentOrderLineItem.

FulfillmentOrderId.description: ID of the FulfillmentOrder associated with the FulfillmentOrderLineItem.

GrossUnitPrice.description: Unit price, including tax, of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem. This value is equal to TotalPrice + TotalTaxAmount.

IsReship.description: Indicates whether the FulfillmentOrderLineItem belongs to a reshipment. The default value is false.

OrderItemId.description: ID of the original OrderItem for the OrderItemSummary associated with the FulfillmentOrderLineItem.

OrderItemSummaryId.description: ID of the OrderItemSummary associated with the FulfillmentOrderLineItem.

Product2Id.description: ID of the product represented by the FulfillmentOrderLineItem.

Quantity.description: Current quantity of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem. Equal to the original quantity minus any canceled quantity.

QuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure of the quantity, for example: unit, gallon, ton, or case.

RejectedQuantity.description: Used by the Distributed Order Management package and Store Fulfillment app to store the quantity that has been rejected by a fulfillment location.

RejectReason.description: If the FulfillmentOrderLineItem was rejected by a fulfillment location, the reason for the rejection.

ReshipReason.description: If the FulfillmentOrderLineItem belongs to a reshipment, the reason for the reshipment.

ServiceDate.description: Service or start date of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem.

TotalAdjustmentAmount.description: Total of any price adjustments applied to the FulfillmentOrderLineItem.

TotalAdjustment​AmountWithTax.description: Total amount of the price adjustments applied to the FulfillmentOrderLineItem, inclusive of tax. This amount is equal to TotalAdjustmentAmount + TotalAdjustmentTaxAmount.

TotalAmount.description: Total, including adjustments and tax, of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem.

TotalLineAmount.description: Total, not including adjustments or tax, of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem.

TotalLineAmount​WithTax.description: Total price of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem, inclusive of tax. This amount is equal to TotalLineAmount + TotalLineTaxAmount.

TotalPrice.description: Total, including adjustments but not tax, of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem. Equal to UnitPrice times Quantity.

Type.description: Type of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem. Matches the type of the associated OrderItemSummary. Delivery Charge indicates that the FulfillmentOrderLineItem represents a delivery charge. Fee indicates that it represents another type of fee, such as a return fee. Order Product indicates that it represents any other type of product, service, or charge. Each type corresponds to one type code, shown here in parentheses.

TypeCode.description: Type code of the FulfillmentOrderLineItem. Matches the type code of the associated OrderItemSummary. Processing depends on this value. Charge indicates that the FulfillmentOrderLineItem represents a charge or fee. Product indicates that it represents any other type of product, service, or charge. A type code can be associated with one or more types.
